result.eng: The men spent their lives mining coal.
result.ga: chaith na fir a saol ag baint guail
result.orig: chaith na fir a saol ag baint guail
result.html: chaith na fir a saol ag baint guailThe men spent their lives mining coal.
result.ponchtml: ċaiṫ na fir a saol ag baint guailThe men spent their lives mining coal.

result.eng: Both men and women were there.
result.ga: bhí idir fhir agus mhná ann
result.orig: bhí idir fhir agus mhná ann
result.html: bhí idir fhir agus mhná annBoth men and women were there.
result.ponchtml: ḃí idir ḟir agus ṁná annBoth men and women were there.

result.eng: The men were able to work hard.
result.ga: bhí na fir in ann obair go crua
result.orig: bhí na fir in ann obair go crua
result.html: bhí na fir in ann obair go cruaThe men were able to work hard.
result.ponchtml: ḃí na fir in ann obair go cruaThe men were able to work hard.

result.eng: Two men twenty years of age were taken to prison.
result.ga: cuireadh beirt fhear fiche bliain d'aois i bpríosún
result.orig: cuireadh beirt fhear fiche bliain d'aois i bpríosún
result.html: cuireadh beirt fhear fiche bliain d'aois i bpríosúnTwo men twenty years of age were taken to prison.
result.ponchtml: cuireaḋ beirt ḟear fiċe bliain d'aois i bpríosúnTwo men twenty years of age were taken to prison.

result.eng: Two men knocked her to the ground and stole her handbag.
result.ga: leag beirt fhear go talamh í agus ghoid siad a mála láimhe
result.orig: leag beirt fhear go talamh í agus ghoid siad a mála láimhe
result.html: leag beirt fhear go talamh í agus ghoid siad a mála láimheTwo men knocked her to the ground and stole her handbag.
result.ponchtml: leag beirt ḟear go talaṁ í agus ġoid siad a mála láiṁeTwo men knocked her to the ground and stole her handbag.

result.eng: She has no interest in men.
result.ga: níl aon suim aici sna fir
result.orig: níl aon suim aici sna fir
result.html: níl aon suim aici sna firShe has no interest in men.
result.ponchtml: níl aon suim aici sna firShe has no interest in men.

result.eng: The number of men who are teachers is decreasing.
result.ga: tá líon na bhfear atá ina múinteoirí ag dul i laghad
result.orig: tá líon na bhfear atá ina múinteoirí ag dul i laghad
result.html: tá líon na bhfear atá ina múinteoirí ag dul i laghadThe number of men who are teachers is decreasing.
result.ponchtml: tá líon na ḃfear atá ina múinteoirí ag dul i laġadThe number of men who are teachers is decreasing.

result.ga: ullmhaigh do chuid fear chun cogaidh
result.orig: ullmhaigh do chuid fear chun cogaidh
result.html: ullmhaigh do chuid fear chun cogaidhPrepare your men for war.
result.ponchtml: ullṁaiġ do ċuid fear ċun cogaiḋPrepare your men for war.

result.eng: 'They're coming to get us!' yelled one of the young men and we all rejoiced.
result.ga: tá siad ag teacht faoinár ndéin liúigh duine de na fir óga agus bhí gliondar croí orainn go léir
result.orig: tá siad ag teacht faoinár ndéin liúigh duine de na fir óga agus bhí gliondar croí orainn go léir
result.html: tá siad ag teacht faoinár ndéin liúigh duine de na fir óga agus bhí gliondar croí orainn go léir'They're coming to get us!' yelled one of the young men and we all rejoiced.
result.ponchtml: tá siad ag teaċt faoinár ndéin liúiġ duine de na fir óga agus ḃí gliondar croí orainn go léir'They're coming to get us!' yelled one of the young men and we all rejoiced.
